forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 21C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 69F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 52F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 64F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
